title: Immortal Realm’s Smuggling Kingpin - Novel Updates
author: Stone Three
description:
What do you think a higher-order world is like? 

In a world that places emphasis on individual development where everyone is devoted to cultivation, it would naturally be much more inferior in other aspects. Game consoles, DVDs, computers, massage chairs—these items are certainly not available. 

You want them? Sure, come in please. Roche Trading has a satisfying assortment of goods, fair prices, honest dealing. 

You want something special? No problem, all kinds of quality products can be found here… 

For group purchase, this way please. There are beautiful fairies at the reception and 20% discounts… 

Luo Qian is able to freely sneak away to the Human Realm unnoticed. Through his business of selling smuggled mortal goods into the Immortal Realm, he aspires to become the number one mogul in smuggling. With the goods that bring continued chaos to the Immortal Realm and a tribulation that awaits him 500 years later, what will become of him?>
